name: Elektorni presents: Pearl River Sound (live) & Juhani Oivo (FI)
description:
Elektorni makes its first international excursion by landing to Oslo‚Äôs Kafe H√¶rverk on the 6th of March!

A night of vinyl records and analogue machinery is afoot, as Rome‚Äôs Pearl River Sound joins Elektorni label head Juhani Oivo for a elektornical all-nighter!

üîπPEARL RIVER SOUND (live)
@pearlriversound ‚ñ´Ô∏è‚ñ´Ô∏è

Pearl River Sound is an Italian producer whose work blends genres like braindance, break beat and ambient into uniquely affecting dance music. Inspired by early AFX, ¬µ-Ziq, and Luke Vibert, his work has found home on labels such as R&S Records‚Äô Meda Fury, X-Kalay, Furthur Electronix, Further records and many more. Next up is a 12‚Äù release on Elektorni, with a four-tracker of bleeped out acid emotion.

Beyond his output as a recording artist, Roberto is the founder of L863, a creative hybrid space in Rome‚Äôs Garbatella district that functions as a record shop, community hub, and cultural venue as well as the base for Rough Radio.

https://soundcloud.com/art_intelligence_records/mix-for-ai

üîπJUHANI OIVO (dj)
@jaydayalldayeveryday ‚ñ´Ô∏è‚ñ´Ô∏è

Juhani Oivo is a vinyl DJ from the city of Oulu in Northern Finland. His Elektorni record label has released music from the likes of Mesak, Rolando Simmons, Daniel Savio and Picture.

Elektorni is also a club night, going on its 15th year, that has played host to artists such as Al Wootton, Tin Man, Kasper Marott and Bj√∏rn Torske. Oivo is an avid follower of current dance music, but is also known to spice his sets with older obscurities and dubplate specials.

https://soundcloud.com/jaydayalldayeveryday
https://soundcloud.com/elektorni
